column2: 18.16.2 EGPWS ▲: The EGPWS enhanced function should be inhibited when the aircraft?
column3: The EGPWS enhanced function should be inhibited when the aircraft position is less than 15 nm from the airfield under the following conditions:

column2: 18.16.2 EGPWS ▲: For operations from / to runways not incorporated into the?
column3: For operations from / to runways not incorporated into the EGPWS database, see Operations to Runways Not in EGPWS Database.

column2: 18.16.2 EGPWS ▲: For specific approach procedures which have previously been identified as?
column3: For specific approach procedures which have previously been identified as potentially producing false terrain alerts. Note: For runways/airports not contained in the installed EGPWS terrain database, crews will be notified via Company Alert messages and/or flight plan/dispatch release remarks.
